title: Numix Material Torch + Wear
developerAddress:
41, Hollybank Drive
Sheffield

description: SIMPLE, PRETTY AND POWERFUL TORCH: Numix Torch is simple flashlight app designed with material design in mind. It can do:- Regular always ON flashlight;- On tap flashlight;- Automatic blinking function with adjustable interval;- Morse SOS strobing that comes bundled with SOS sound signal;- Support for Android Wear Smart Watches. USAGE:Just press the flashlight button on the bottom right. If you wish you may activate the on tap flashlight, sos or blinking option before that.If you have a wearable, just install Numix Torch on your paired phone. The app will be automatically installed on your watch too.  OPEN SOURCE:Numix Torch's source code is available on GitHub: https://github.com/numixproject/org.numixproject.torch MATERIAL DESIGN:Numix Torch is fully material designed and as such it is integrated in Android 5.0. If you're on Lollipop you will get all the material design animations and elements. If you are on KitKat and below you will still get the material design animations. Basic version:The app has built in apps which you can remove from the "remove adds" item from the hamburger menu on the right on the app actionbar.
descriptionHTML:
SIMPLE, PRETTY AND POWERFUL TORCH:
Numix Torch is simple flashlight app designed with material design in mind. It can do:
- Regular always ON flashlight;
- On tap flashlight;
- Automatic blinking function with adjustable interval;
- Morse SOS strobing that comes bundled with SOS sound signal;
- Support for Android Wear Smart Watches.

USAGE:
Just press the flashlight button on the bottom right. If you wish you may activate the on tap flashlight, sos or blinking option before that.

If you have a wearable, just install Numix Torch on your paired phone. The app will be automatically installed on your watch too.

OPEN SOURCE:
Numix Torch's source code is available on GitHub: https://github.com/numixproject/org.numixproject.torch

MATERIAL DESIGN:
Numix Torch is fully material designed and as such it is integrated in Android 5.0. If you're on Lollipop you will get all the material design animations and elements. If you are on KitKat and below you will still get the material design animations.

Basic version:
The app has built in apps which you can remove from the "remove adds" item from the hamburger menu on the right on the app actionbar.
comments: I have seen the light! It nice to have a flashlight app that doesn't ask for crazy permissions. It force closes occasionally on my G3, but I'm sure that will get worked out, and when it does I'll purchase the ad free version.
recentChanges: * Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements to performance and stability;
